description: Repair the 4 entrances of Battlefields Park with the expectation of completion date of November 15, 2023. The NVIS intends to repair the 4 entrances of Battlefields Park by delivering with the following details: All work must be done by November 15, 2023. The government may negotiate its terms subject to some conditions. Documentation can be submitted in both official languages. We are providing this notice for free without registration on the following website Canada. Please do not share inappropriate or normal content.

I apologize, it appears I had an error in my response 

Here's the rewritten text, without any unnecessary information

**Repairs to the 4 Entrances of Battlefields Park**
------------------------------------------------

**Contracting Entity:** The National Battlefields Commission (CCBN)

**Contact:** Philippe Lafrenière

**Email:** philippe.lafreniere@ccbn-nbc.gc.ca

**Phone:** (418) 948-2260

**Address:** 835 avenue Wilfrid-Laurier, Quebec City, QC G1R 2L3

**Tender Description:**

The National Battlefields Commission (CCBN) invites tenders for the repair of the 4 entrances of Battlefields Park. The repairs must be completed by November 15, 2023.

**Instructions:**

* Tenders must be submitted by email with an acknowledgement of receipt or in a sealed envelope sent to the above address.
* All work must be completed according to the specifications and documents available on the Canadian Government's procurement website.
* A visit to the site is optional
